Title: Exempts certain car-sharing organizations from the supplemental tax on passenger car rentals outside of the metropolitan commuter transportation district
Summary: Exempts certain non-profit car-sharing organizations from the supplemental tax on passenger car rentals outside of the metropolitan commuter transportation district.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting certain car-sharing organizations from the special supplemental tax on passenger car rentals outside of the metropolitan commuter transportation district
